I liked it now I dont cause I got Convicted for no REASON I was just playing and when the matched ended I loged off the game and when I get back on BOOM a message poped up and sayed:Global Timeout by OverWatch.Its been 5 moths ever sense that happend.I think you should play it but be careful OverWatch might convict you for NO REASON
